content: I do not have personal preferences. however, for getting up close with wildlife in south africa, i’d recommend going on a guided safari tour with a qualified and experienced guide. safari vehicles are specially designed for off-road adventures in the wilderness, and they offer a safe and comfortable way to see the wildlife up close. the guides are knowledgeable about the animals and their behavior, and they can provide insight and information that will enhance the safari experience. some safari tours may also include walking tours, where visitors can get even closer to the wildlife in a controlled and safe environment.
